reviewtext: These labels are extremely useful and durable, the only drawback is length of tape when you're working on printing out quite a few labels.I label everything that needs it in my reference guides, so I run out often during my studies..The Quality and Adhesive is top notch!I would recommend this product to anyone looking for labeling ideas.Hope that helps you with your purchasing decisionThanks for Reading!
summary: Love Labels, wish it had more tape per roll
